snippet: Lawyers for Jon S. Corzine, who was accused of a failure of leadership at the helm of the MF Global, filed a motion to dismiss a civil case against him. | Verizon Communications plans to sell up to $49 billion of bonds in record debt offering. |...
abstract: Lawyers for Jon S. Corzine, who was accused of a failure of leadership at the helm of the MF Global, filed a motion to dismiss a civil case against him. | Verizon Communications plans to sell up to $49 billion of bonds in record debt offering. | Deals like LinkedIn’s recent sale of stock may simply feed a trading frenzy.
